sentences.sContent: There is more than one way to tackle the problem.
sentences.sCn: 解决这个问题不止一个办法。

sentences.sContent: It took twelve fire engines to tackle the blaze .
sentences.sCn: 出动了12辆消防车来扑救那场大火。

sentences.sContent: ...Some fast-food firms provide healthy food to give the impression they are helping to tackle the obesity problem...
...which are schools that better serve our children and our nation by encouraging students to tackle tough subjects under the guidance of gifted teachers...

exam.question: Although many experts agree that more children are overweight, there is debate over the best ways to ______ the problem.

answer.explain: 句意： 尽管许多专家都认同更多儿童超重的说法， 但在解决这一问题的最佳方法上他们仍存在争论。relate： 使联系； file： 把文件归档； attach： 系上。

phrases.pCn: 起重滑车；提升滑轮；滑轮起吊设备

words.tran: 做抓和揪动作的人；阻截队员；抱住并摔倒对方抱球队员者
固定住；暂时缝上；附加；改变航向（tack的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to try to deal with a difficult problem
